author: Barack Obama
message: Focusing your life solely on making a buck shows a poverty of ambition. It asks too little of yourself. And it will leave you unfulfilled.
title: Thought of the day

author: Dalai Lama
message: Compassion and happiness are not a sign of weakness but a sign of strength.
title: Thought of the day

author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
message: It is common sense to take a method and try it. If it fails, admit it frankly and try another. But above all, try something.
title: Thought of the day

author: David Bader
message: Be here now. Be someplace else later. Is that so complicated?
title: Thought of the day
